input.issue: Analyze capabilities of Kubernetes resource: PodDisruptionBudget

output:
{
  "capabilities": [
    "pod disruption control",
    "minAvailable policy",
    "maxUnavailable policy",
    "label selector targeting",
    "unhealthy pod eviction policy (AlwaysAllow, IfHealthyBudget)",
    "disruptions allowed and health status tracking"
  ],
  "providers": ["kubernetes"],
  "abstractions": ["high availability", "policy-based eviction control", "status and conditions reporting"],
  "complexity": "medium",
  "description": "Defines the maximum disruption permitted for a collection of pods using minAvailable or maxUnavailable, with optional health-aware eviction policy. Provides status on healthy counts and disruptions allowed.",
  "useCase": "Maintain application health by limiting pod disruptions for selected pods via a defined budget and eviction policy.",
  "confidence": 0.86
}
